arts.ttl: Milan draw with Genoa on club's 125th anniversary
arts.sum: AC Milan were held to a 0-0 draw by Genoa in Serie A at the San Siro on Sunday, a result that dimmed the festivities on the club's 125th anniversary.

arts.ttl: Milan Player Ratings vs Genoa: Horror Anniversary
arts.sum: Milan couldn't have imagined a worse way to celebrate their 125th birthday than a heart-wrenching 0-0 home draw against minnows Genoa. Patrick Vieira's side put on a resilient defensive performance at Stadio San Siro, fending off Paulo Fonseca's experimental line-up in one of the most uneventful fixtures in recent Serie A memory. The post Milan Player Ratings vs Genoa: Horror Anniversary appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: AC Milan close to sealing Pulisic contract extension
arts.sum: After an unsuccessful stint with Chelsea, Pulisic signed a four-year contract with the Italian side, until July 2027, so the extension is for one more year and with the option to continue until 2029. Up until last week, the American forward had been enjoying one of the best moments of his career with AC Milan - he is the team’s top scorer with eight goals and also leads the assists ranking, level on six with Rafael Leão.
